languages.text: {n}Выражение лица Маражая неуловимо меняется — в глазах появляется голодная злоба. Ирлиэт слишком поздно замечает тревожный знак — и успевает только отшатнуться, когда клинок со свистом рассекает воздух. Эльдарка едва сдерживает вскрик, хватаясь за глубокую рану — но отступает лишь на пядь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Выражение лица Маражая неуловимо меняется — в глазах появляется голодная злоба. Ирлиэт слишком поздно замечает тревожный знак — и успевает только отшатнуться, когда клинок со свистом рассекает воздух. Эльдарка едва сдерживает вскрик, хватаясь за глубокую рану — но отступает лишь на пядь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Marazhai change subtilement, et une étincelle maléfique passe dans ses yeux. Yrliet reconnaît les signes, mais trop tard ; quand elle recule, la lame a déjà fini sa course. Elle réprime un cri et porte la main à sa blessure profonde, mais elle ne fait pas plus d'un pas en arrière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Marazhai change subtilement, et une étincelle maléfique passe dans ses yeux. Yrliet reconnaît les signes, mais trop tard ; quand elle recule, la lame a déjà fini sa course. Elle réprime un cri et porte la main à sa blessure profonde, mais elle ne fait pas plus d'un pas en arrière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの表情が微妙に変化し、その目に飢えた悪意が宿る。ユリエットは危険な兆候に気づいたものの、それは遅すぎた。すでに刃が空気を切り裂いていたのだ。彼女はかろうじて叫び声を抑え、深い傷を強く抑えるが、一歩も退かない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの表情が微妙に変化し、その目に飢えた悪意が宿る。ユリエットは危険な兆候に気づいたものの、それは遅すぎた。すでに刃が空気を切り裂いていたのだ。彼女はかろうじて叫び声を抑え、深い傷を強く抑えるが、一歩も退かない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的表情出现了微妙的变化，目光中闪烁着饥渴的恶意。然而，当伊莉耶特注意到这些令人警觉的迹象时，为时已晚。玛拉斋的利刃刺破了空气，她猛地退了回来。伊莉耶特勉强忍住了痛苦的叫喊，紧紧捂住了深深的伤口，但没再继续后退。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的表情出现了微妙的变化，目光中闪烁着饥渴的恶意。然而，当伊莉耶特注意到这些令人警觉的迹象时，为时已晚。玛拉斋的利刃刺破了空气，她猛地退了回来。伊莉耶特勉强忍住了痛苦的叫喊，紧紧捂住了深深的伤口，但没再继续后退。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Ausdruck verändert sich leicht, und hungrige Tücke blitzt in seinen Augen auf. Yrliet bemerkt die Warnzeichen zu spät und schreckt erst zurück, als die Klinge die Luft bereits durchschnitten hat. Nur mit Mühe unterdrückt sie einen Schrei. Sie hält sich die tiefe Wunde, tritt jedoch nur einen einzigen Schritt zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Ausdruck verändert sich leicht, und hungrige Tücke blitzt in seinen Augen auf. Yrliet bemerkt die Warnzeichen zu spät und schreckt erst zurück, als die Klinge die Luft bereits durchschnitten hat. Nur mit Mühe unterdrückt sie einen Schrei. Sie hält sich die tiefe Wunde, tritt jedoch nur einen einzigen Schritt zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se produce un sutil cambio en la expresión de Marazhai; sus ojos se iluminan con un destello de malicia voraz. Yrliet tarda demasiado en advertir las señales de alarma; únicamente se aparta cuando la hoja ya ha hendido el aire. Contiene un grito a duras penas y se lleva las manos a una herida profunda... pero no retrocede más que un solo paso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

Yrliet tarda demasiado en advertir las señales de alarma; únicamente se aparta cuando la hoja ya ha hendido el aire. Contiene un grito a duras penas y se lleva las manos a una herida profunda... pero no retrocede más que un solo paso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözleri aç, kötücül arzulara teslim olmaya başlayan Marazhai'ın yüz ifadesi, hafiften değişiyor. Yrliet, bu tehlike işaretlerini çok geç fark ediyor ve geri sıçradığında kılıç, çoktan havayı kesmeye başlamış oluyor. Çığlığını zar zor zapt edip aldığı derin yarayı eliyle kavrıyor. Bu sırada geriye doğru yalnızca bir adım atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's expression changes subtly as hungering malice flashes in his eyes. Yrliet notices the alarming signs too late — and only recoils when the blade has already cut through the air. She barely suppresses a cry and clutches her deep wound — but she does not retreat farther than a single step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözlerine aç ve kötücül arzular hâkim olmaya başlıyor ve yüz ifadesi çok hafif değişiyor. Yrliet bu tehlike işaretlerini çok geç fark ediyor, geri sıçradığında, kılıç çoktan havayı kesmeye başlamıştı bile. Çığlığını zar zor zaptediyor ve aldığı derin yarayı eliyle kavrıyor ama geriye doğru tek bir adım atıyor, daha fazla değil.{/n}
